publicTransport.overview: Lisbon has an excellent integrated public transport network operated by Carris (buses/trams) and Metro de Lisboa. All modes use the same ticketing system, making it easy to transfer between different transport types.

modes.name: Metro
modes.description: 4 lines covering major areas. Fast and air-conditioned.

modes.name: Trams
modes.description: Historic trams, especially Line 28. Great for sightseeing.

modes.name: Buses
modes.description: Extensive network reaching all areas. Some night services.

vivaViagem.title: Viva Viagem Card
vivaViagem.description: The rechargeable smart card for all public transport in Lisbon. One card works on metro, buses, trams, and ferries using "zapping" credit (pay-as-you-go).

options.name: Taxi / Uber
options.tip: Best choice for late arrival: Reliable, comfortable, and gets you to your accommodation quickly after a long flight. With AeroBus suspended, this is the most practical option for groups with luggage.
